message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.ArrayList' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.handlers.sign.ArenaSign'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.handlers.sign.ArenaSign'.
'.' has incorrect indentation level 10, expected level should be 12.
WhitespaceAround: '+' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
